name: yt-twitch-chat-toggle
description: Toggle between YouTube and Twitch chat on YouTube live streams

scripts.build: bun run clean && bun run compile-scss && bun run compile && bun run copy-assets && bun scripts/build.ts && bun run clean
scripts.package: bun run build && cd dist && zip -r ../yt-twitch-chat-toggle.zip .
scripts.compile-scss: sass src/styles/styles.scss src/styles.css && sass src/styles/popup.scss src/popup.css && sass src/styles/prompt.scss src/prompt.css
scripts.copy-assets: cp src/manifest.json dist/ && cp src/popup.html dist/ && cp src/prompt.html dist/ && cp src/popup.css dist/ && cp src/prompt.css dist/ && cp src/styles.css dist/ && cp -r src/icons dist/
scripts.watch-scss: sass --watch src/styles/styles.scss:src/styles.css & sass --watch src/styles/popup.scss:src/popup.css & sass --watch src/styles/prompt.scss:src/prompt.css
scripts.dev: bun run clean && bun run compile-scss && bun run watch-scss & bun run watch
scripts.clean: rm -f src/styles.css src/styles.css.map src/popup.css src/popup.css.map src/prompt.css src/prompt.css.map
scripts.check: bun run type-check && bun run lint
